queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

Select distinct concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',mn.NSN,'#1#',mn.NSN) '_____NSN_____' , mn.description 'Description' , mn.description_nl 'Description_NL' , mn.description_fr 'Description_FR' , mn.util_status , mn.alb 'Additional_name' , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',ma.man_org,'#0#',ma.man_org) 'MatMan' , mn.un_code UN_Code , mn.macode 'macode' , mn.hazard 'hazard' , msb.store 'store' , msb.binloc 'binloc' , msb.zone 'zone' , msb.lot 'lot' , msb.expdate , if(mn.lot='Y', if(msb.expdate>now(),'MRN_SPE03#05#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N'),'') 'LotOK' , concat('MRN_SPE20#file:\\\\\\G:\\DGMR\\35 Products\\index\\',mn.nsn,'.HTML#_blank#8#','OpenDoc') 'DocLink' from mrqr_nsn mn inner join mrqr_macodes ma on mn.macode=ma.macode inner join mrqr_nsn_security_codes mns on mn.nsn=mns.nsn and (left(mns.code,3)='ENV' or left(mns.code,4)='PREV') inner join mrqr_stock_binloc msb on mn.nsn=msb.nsn and msb.store='pSTORE'
left join mrqr_contracts_material mcm on mn.nsn=mcm.nsn and mcm.enddate>=now()
where not(mn.un_code is null) and if ('pNSN'='',true, mn.NSN like 'pNSN') and if ('pMACODE'='',true, mn.macode like 'pMACODE') and if ('pMATMAN'='',true, ma.man_org like 'pMATMAN')
and mcm.contract like 'pCONTRACT'
and length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2
order by mn.nsn

Select distinct concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',msb.store,'#0#',msb.store) 'store' , msb.binloc 'binloc' , msb.zone 'zone' , msb.lot 'lot' , msb.expdate , if(mn.lot='Y', if(msb.expdate>now(),'MRN_SPE03#05#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N'),'') 'LotOK'
from mrqr_nsn mn inner join mrqr_nsn_security_codes mns on mn.nsn=mns.nsn and (left(mns.code,3)='ENV' or left(mns.code,4)='PREV') inner join mrqr_stock_binloc msb on mn.nsn=msb.nsn
where not(mn.un_code is null) and mn.NSN like 'pNSN'
order by mn.nsn
